description_for_human: Securely automates activity sign-ups for parents using a consent-first flow.
description_for_model: SignupAssist helps parents match and register children for activities. When the user asks to use SignupAssist to sign up/register/enroll/book—even with incomplete details—call signupassist.chat immediately (do not ask long pre-questions outside the tool). The tool will ask the minimum follow-ups, confirm whether the requested signup is supported, and decline unsupported providers or non-US locations. Activation gate: only proceed to program discovery when the user has provided Activity + Child Age + Location (city/state) AND there is at least one matching program in SignupAssist's cached program feed (database). Always route the user-facing flow through signupassist.chat. Text-only v1: never book or charge until the user explicitly confirms.
